overview:
Neil Buchan has previously been in conventional print and design for over 11 years, but now can be found finding out how to exploit new and existing internet technologies and apply them to solving clients’ problems.

He is particularly fond of Flash and ActionScript technologies and binding them to the more mundane XAMP to provide innovative ways of presenting biology, particle sciences, astronomy (and any other science) to lay audiences, particularly where interactivity and animation are required.
